commandDescription: import/export reference data from Salesforce into your dx project files
pullDescription: Exports records from the object specified.
pushDescription: Imports records from the object specified.
pushAllDescription: Imports records from all objects specified in the config file.
pullAllDescription: Exports records from all objects specified in the config file.
objectDescription: The sobject(s) that you wish to import/export reference data from.
pathToDataDir: The path where the reference data resides. The default is 'data'.
removeObjects: Delete the record(s) from the target within the specified directory.
allowPartial: Allows the operation to continue when a failure occurs.
